alert.note: Alert for Eastern Clay; Inland St. Johns; Western Clay (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 01 at 4:32PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central St. Johns and east central Clay Counties through 500 PM EDT... At 432 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Green Cove Springs, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Green Cove Springs and Picolata. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Clay; Inland St. Johns; Western Clay
